alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Portage; Stark; Summit; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 8:00PM EDT until July 20 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Portage County in northeastern Ohio... Southern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Mahoning County in northeastern Ohio... Stark County in northeastern Ohio... Southern Summit County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 759 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hubbard to near Kent to 6 miles northeast of Wadsworth, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Akron, Canton, Youngstown, Salem, Ravenna, Columbiana, Cuyahoga Falls, Boardman, Massillon, Kent, Barberton, Green, Alliance, Niles, Tallmadge, North Canton, Louisville, Campbell, Hubbard and Canfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
